item.title: R 语言统计检验函数汇总
item.description: 连续型数据 基于分布的检验 T检验 t.test(1:10, 10:20) ## ## Welch Two Sample t-test ## ## data: 1:10 and 10:20 ## t = -7, df = 19, p-value = 2e-06 ## alternative hypothesis: true difference in means is not equal to 0 ## 95 percent confidence interval: ## -12.4 -6.6 ## sample estimates: ## mean of x mean of y ## 5.5 15.0 配对 t 检验： t.test(rnorm(10), rnorm(10, mean = 1), paired = TRUE) ## ## Paired t-test ## ## data: rnorm(10) and rnorm(10, mean = 1) ## t = -2, df = 9, p-value = 0.03 ## alternative hypothesis: true difference in means is not equal to 0 ## 95 percent confidence interval: ## -1.981 -0.096 ## sample estimates: ## mean of the differences ## -1.04 使
